did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Picture file from the Richmond Times-Dispatch and Richmond News-Leader1925-1950
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 2329 black and white photographs.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Photographs may not be reproduced without the permission of the copyright owner.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Picture file from the Richmond Times-Dispatch and Richmond News-Leader, Accession #9698, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer from the Reference Division, University of Virginia Library, 1971 February 23.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Upon receipt from the Reference Division, the photographs were interfiled in the Special Collections department's general prints and photographs file. In 2007, the photographs were removed from the prints file and re-assembled as a collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of black and white photographs of scenes in Virginia. Topics include recreational activities, business and industry, people, events and historic buildings.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically by the name of the Virginia political division (city or county) or geographic region (Eastern Shore, Piedmont) in which the photographs were taken. In addition, there are a few topical groupings (Highways).
